content: Ahem . . . Trump executive order to slash regulationsPolitics | Mon Jan 30, 2017 | 10:11am EST WASHINGTON President Donald Trump plans to sign an executive order on Monday…www.reuters.com In short 2 regs cut for one new. This sounds like a legal absurdity. Analogize it to laws in general. For every new law, we have to cut 2 existing ones. That’s not the way laws/regulations work. This order cannot stand. It is in effect a regulation freeze of indeterminate duration.
